name: SpaceBear
description: A 2D platformer made using a JavaScript library called codeheart.js. Made in 36 hours with two teammates during a summer camp at Michigan State University.

name: Quizlexa
description: Won ninth place at Spartahack 2. An (unpublished) Alexa skill + companion webapp for practicing Quizlet digital flash cards.

name: Running Calculator
description: I wrote this JFX application to help my high school cross country coach with managing and planning workouts for our team. It even has CSV import/export support.

name: now-playing: Spotify for Bash
description: A command line tool to control basic Spotify playback in the Bash terminal (play/pause, skip, seek, view current song). Built using cURL and a lightweight ExpressJS server. Click here for the GitHub repo.

name: Michigan Hackers Website
description: A ReactJS frontend, Go backend brochure website for Michigan Hackers at the University of Michigan. I was the backend developer and lead frontend developer of this website. Click here to see the website!

name: Talks for Video Game Music Club
description: As vice president of the Video Game Music Club at the University of Michigan, I help prepare a talk for (nearly) every weekly club meeting. Click here to view some of the talks we've given!

name: FAMNM Website
description: I was elected the webmaster of the FIRST Alumni and Mentors Network at Michigan (FAMNM), a volunteer group at the University of Michigan that mentors local robotics teams. Click here to see the website I maintain.

name: Metroid (NES) Remake
description: As a project in EECS 494: Game Development at the University of Michigan, I (along with a partner), recreated the Brinstar area from Metroid in Unity. Click to download (for Windows and Mac)

name: The Archive Album
description: All of the music I arranged/composed in 2016 and 2017, all in one album. A mishmash of covers and original work.

name: The Castle
description: A tone-poem I wrote in early 2019, inspired by depictions of Dracula's Castle (especially in art from the Castlevania series of video games
